product_name: Sawyer Premium Maxi DEET Insect Repellent - 98 Percent DEET - 0.5 fl. oz.
long_description: Fend off mosquitoes, biting flies, chiggers, ticks, fleas and gnats for up to 10 hrs. with Sawyer Premium Maxi DEET(TM) insect repellent. 98% DEET solution provides excellent repellency. Application is simple with pump spray bottle; slender bottle fits easily in a pack.
short_description: Fend off mosquitoes, biting flies, chiggers, ticks, fleas and gnats for up to 10 hrs. with Sawyer Premium Maxi DEET(TM) insect repellent.
